Content.Text:
<NAME_MOB_JACK>
Hey, you need to eat more!

<NAME_MOB_JACK>
Oh, hello! I'm doing some farm work.

<NAME_MOB_JACK>
Ugh... Our lady is scary. Her temper's
unpredictable, she's always bossy...

<NAME_MOB_JACK>
People say our lady is really kind deep down
inside, but I can't agree with that.

<NAME_MOB_JACK>
I wonder when our lady will end up getting
married... I feel sorry for her future husband...
<PAGE>
...Whoa! Please don't tell her I said that!

<NAME_MOB_JACK>
Our lady's very kind these days... What happened
to her...?

<NAME_MOB_JACK>
The other day, our lady actually thanked me.
Shock of my life, let me tell you!

<NAME_MOB_JACK>
It's great to see what a nice person our lady's
become.
